Description: Fragment from a large warp-faced plain weave, linen cloth with tapestry (grouped warp threads) decoration; Design of vine leaves and strapwork twists in outline; Includes part of an integrally-woven tapestry weft in purple-blue wool and linen; Warp fringe (c.14.5cm long) is preceeded with many paired self-bands; Tapestry motif originally an eight pointed star with long tails to right and left; Warp: S spun linen, c.17tpc; Weft: S spun linen & wool, c.9tpc in plain areas, c.60tpc in tapestry, soumak in undyed, S spun linen; Edges: plain selvedge, warp fringe.
Curator's comments: Unreg. 109. Includes small bag with fibres; Found in old cardboard box in M7; Information from Hero Granger-Taylor (19.5.1992)
